pages.text: A vital reagent used to create $(l:potion_category)Witcher Potions$() and refill them. Can also be used to craft Campfires (see next page).
Ingredients: Glass Bottle x1, $(l:crafting/alcohest#page_alcohol_base)Alcohol Base$() x1, $(l:crafting/alcohest#page_sweet_material)Sweet Material$() x1.
A standard campfire, useful when the Witcher needs to $(l:potions/meditation#page_meditation)meditate$(). You can safely harvest unlit campfires as long as you use an axe.
Ingredients: Stick x3, Alcohest x1, Any Log x3.

pages.title: Alcohol Bases
pages.text: Alcohol Bases are a vital reagent used in $(l:crafting/alcohest#page_alcohest)[Alcohest]$(). Alcohol Bases include:$(li)Wheat$(li)Sugar Cane$(li)Potato$(li)Cactus$(li)Apple

pages.title: Sweet Materials
pages.text: Sweet Materials are a vital reagent used in $(l:crafting/alcohest#page_alcohest)[Alcohest]$(). Sweet Materials include:$(li)Sweet Berries$(li)Chorus Fruit$(li)Glow Berries$(li)Cocoa Beans$(li)Nether Wart$(li)Honey Bottle
